segments.text: What a wonderful party ! I had a good time . How about you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Shall I give you a ride home ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , if it's not too much of a trouble .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's no trouble at all because your house is on the way to my place .
segments.speaker: S1
